description: Raw disk access using illegitimate tools, possible defence evasion Author: Teymur Kheirkhabarov, oscd.community. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
false_positives: Legitimate Administrator using tool for raw access or ongoing forensic investigation
name: Raw Disk Access Using Illegitimate Tools
query: (NOT ((Device:*floppy*) OR (process.executable:(C\:\\Windows\\System32\\* OR C\:\\Windows\\SystemApps\\*) AND process.executable:(*\\wmiprvse.exe OR *\\sdiagnhost.exe OR *\\searchindexer.exe OR *\\csrss.exe OR *\\defrag.exe OR *\\smss.exe OR *\\vssvc.exe OR *\\compattelrunner.exe OR *\\wininit.exe OR *\\autochk.exe OR *\\taskhost.exe OR *\\dfsrs.exe OR *\\vds.exe OR *\\lsass.exe OR *\\svchost.exe OR *\\MsMpEng.exe OR *\\SearchApp.exe OR *\\powershell.exe OR *\\GamingServices.exe OR *\\SearchUI.exe)) OR (ProcessId:"4") OR (process.executable:("C\:\\Windows\\System32\\backgroundTaskHost.exe" OR "C\:\\Windows\\System32\\RuntimeBroker.exe" OR "C\:\\Windows\\System32\\MoUsoCoreWorker.exe" OR "C\:\\Windows\\System32\\taskhostw.exe" OR "C\:\\Windows\\System32\\SrTasks.exe" OR "C\:\\Windows\\System32\\dllhost.exe" OR "C\:\\Windows\\System32\\DeviceCensus.exe" OR "C\:\\Windows\\System32\\MpSigStub.exe" OR "C\:\\Windows\\UUS\\amd64\\MoUsoCoreWorker.exe")) OR (process.executable:"System") OR (process.executable:*\\Keybase\\upd.exe) OR (process.executable:C\:\\ProgramData\\Microsoft\\Windows\ Defender\\Platform\\* AND process.executable:*\\MsMpEng.exe) OR (process.executable:(C\:\\Program\ Files\\* OR C\:\\Program\ Files\ \(x86\)\\*)) OR (process.executable:*C\:\\Users\\* AND process.executable:*\\AppData\\* AND process.executable:*\\Microsoft\\*)))
